thread.title: Ramaphosa elected SA president, vows anti-corruption fight

title: Ramaphosa elected SA president, vows anti-corruption fight
text:
Ramaphosa elected SA president, vows anti-corruption fight   01:41 
Cyril Ramaphosa was elected as South Africa’s president in a parliamentary vote on Thursday and pledged to tackle endemic corruption after scandal-ridden Jacob Zuma resigned on orders from the ruling African National Congress. Laura Frykberg reports.   
Cyril Ramaphosa was elected as South Africa’s president in a parliamentary vote on Thursday and pledged to tackle endemic corruption after scandal-ridden Jacob Zuma resigned on orders from the ruling African National Congress. Laura Frykberg reports.  //reut.rs/2sxzwgW
